hero.title: Where Pakistan’s Internet Is Headed
hero.subhead: 5G, fiber, AI and rights frameworks will shape the next decade of participation and growth.

forecasts.title: Signals & projections (2026–2030)
forecasts.lead: Conservative estimates based on regional trends and current baselines.

initiatives.title: Key tracks to unlock value
initiatives.lead: Execution across infrastructure, capability and trust.

items.title: Nationwide Fiber & IXPs
items.description: Last‑mile fiber in metros and shared backhaul to tier‑2 cities; local peering to lower latency.

items.title: 5G Standalone Pilots
items.description: Campus networks, FWA for SMEs and industrial IoT sandboxes in ports and SEZs.

items.title: AI for Public Services
items.description: Voice bots for citizen services, OCR for records, and AI triage in tele‑health.

items.title: Fintech & Open Payments
items.description: Interoperable rails, QR ubiquity and SME credit scoring to lift digital commerce.

items.title: Skills & Startup Pipeline
items.description: National micro‑credentials, cloud credits and co‑working near campuses.

items.title: Rights & Safety by Design
items.description: Transparent content rules, due process and data protection to build trust.

scenarios.title: Three plausible futures
scenarios.lead: Direction hinges on spectrum policy, investment and rights guarantees.

items.name: Green Sprint
items.outlook: Co‑ordinated spectrum + fiber capex; exports hit $5B; costs fall; inclusion expands.

items.name: Patchy Progress
items.outlook: Selective metros thrive; second‑tier cities lag; affordability pressure persists.

items.name: Stalled Momentum
items.outlook: Regulatory risk delays 5G/fiber; talent churn rises; platforms de‑prioritize market.

roadmap.title: Near‑term roadmap
roadmap.lead: Milestones any coalition (public, private, civil society) can rally around.

steps.title: Spectrum & Peering
steps.detail: Finalize spectrum roadmap; expand IXPs in Karachi/Lahore/Islamabad.

steps.title: Fiber Densification
steps.detail: Duct sharing policies; metro last‑mile pilots; open‑access wholesale.

steps.title: 5G SA Clusters
steps.detail: Campus networks in SEZs and ports; FWA for SME corridors.

steps.title: GovTech at Scale
steps.detail: AI‑assisted services; one‑stop citizen portals; data registries.

risks.title: Key risks & mitigations
risks.lead: Build guardrails early to maintain trust and investment.

items.name: Affordability squeeze
items.mitigation: Device financing and targeted data subsidies; promote competition.

items.name: Data protection gaps
items.mitigation: Pass + enforce DPA with independent oversight and breach notification.

items.name: Platform volatility
items.mitigation: Interoperable rails and local caching; predictable, consultative rules.

items.name: Skills shortage
items.mitigation: Micro‑credentials tied to employer demand; remote‑work infrastructure.

cta.heading: Ready to shape the next decade?
cta.copy: See how today’s choices in policy and infrastructure ripple across jobs, services and rights.
